description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 20.

Note that the solution to this bug will require writing code that other entities than "server" will use (since all entities share the same basic REST structure for CRUD.)
title: Support GET /servers and GET /servers/detail in API
